## CircuitBreakerMetricsOptions.prefix property

Prefix for metrics

**Signature:**

```typescript
prefix?: string;
```

## Example

```js
{
  "prefix": "my_service"
}
```

Will create metrics with name `my_service_circuit_breaker_counter`
